subject: online RP pronunciation dictionary
msgSnippet: Does anyone here know of any online RP pronunciation dictionary/resources? Basically I m after something like the Merriam-Webster Online dictionary:
messageBody:
Does anyone here know of any online RP pronunciation
dictionary/resources?
Basically I'm after something like the Merriam-Webster Online
dictionary: www.merriam-webster.com but with RP pronunciation.
I wish to make a small dictionary database of most frequent 200 or so
words spelt according to the International QS proposal of John Cowan's
in message no. 2017 of this list. I also wish to list alongside the
QS spelling a non-rhotic RP and General American based spelling so
that any differences can be compared.
Possibly I might expand the size so that it could be used as a future
TO to QS text conversion resource.
